title: Elliott’s $5.5 Billion Japan Shift Faces Test on Toyota Deadline
description: Elliott Investment Management has bet billions applying its tough style of activist investing to Japan. Now, as a crucial deadline finally arrives, the firm faces a high-profile test.
content: Elliott Investment Management has bet billions applying its tough style of activist investing to Japan. Now, as a crucial deadline finally arrives, the firm faces a high-profile test.
